description.narrative: (1) Demonstration Effect of a South-South Investment: The Project will be the first PET project in Egypt and North Africa as a whole, a region which has the potential to become an important region in this industry. The Project is a South-South investment and its success could help GOE attract further FDI in the country. (2) Promotion of Downstream Industry: The water and carbonated soft drinks bottling industries in Egypt, which comprise several small players, currently lack domestic sources of PET resin. This Project is expected to help these players improve the efficiency of their operations through savings in logistics costs. (3) Diversification of export earnings: The majority of Egypt's foreign currency revenues currently come from natural gas sales and tourism. The Project is expected to contribute to the diversification of Egypt's export base. (4) Employment Creation: The Project is expected to create about 450 permanent jobs and about 800 jobs during construction. In addition, it will provide indirect employment through use of local port facilities and supplies.

South Asian Petrochem Limited (SAPL or the Sponsor), Indias second largest manufacturer of Polyethylene Terephthalate (PET), and Egyptian Petrochemical Holding Company (Echem), an agency of the Government of Egypt, have set up a joint venture (JV) to establish a 420,000 tpa greenfield PET resin plant in the Eldorado Integrated Development and Free Zone S.A.E. which is at Sector 2 of the Southern Region of the Economic and Industrial Zone, North West of the Suez Gulf at Ain Sokhna on Egypts Red Sea coast (the Project). SAPL will hold a 70% share in the JV Egyptian Indian Polyester Company (EIPET or the Company), Echem will hold 23%, and Engineering for the Petroleum & Process Industries (Enppi), another Government of Egypt agency, will hold the balance (7%). The Project has an estimated cost of approximately $160 million.
PET, which is produced from mono ethylene glycol (MEG) and terephthalic acid (PTA), is sold in small pellets and its major use is for the manufacture of lightweight plastic bottles for carbonated soft drinks and water.

mailing-address.narrative: Rajiv Sharma Sr.Vice President (Finance) & C.F.O. South Asian Petrochem Limited Dhunseri House, 4A, Woodburn Park, Kolkata 700020 India Telephone: +91-33-2280 1957 (Direct); +91-33-2283-6130-33 (Ext.106) Fax:+91-33-2283 4216/ 22801956

name.narrative: The Project will be located at the Eldorado Integrated Development and Free Zone SAE Company site, which is at Sector-2 of the Southern region of the Economic and Industrial Zone, North West of the Suez Gulf at Ain Sokhna. The site is connected by highway 100 km east of Cairo.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
